Package com.testpaper.controller

Class AdminController

java.lang.Object
com.testpaper.controller.AdminController
@RestController @RequestMapping("/Admin") @CrossOrigin("http://localhost:3000/") public class AdminController extends Object
This class represents the RESTful API controller for the Admin functionalities. It handles various HTTP requests related to managing users, tests, questions, subjects, and provides endpoints for retrieving statistics and counts. The endpoints in this controller require authentication and are accessible only to the Admin role.
Since:
21-06-2023
Version:
17
Author:
TPG team

  • Method Details

    • addUser

      @PostMapping("/user") public String addUser(@RequestBody User user)
      Adds a new user with the provided user object. Generates a random password for the user and sends an email with the details.
      Parameters:
      user - The user object containing user details.
      Returns:
      The username of the created user.

    • sendMail

      public void sendMail(String username, String email, String password)
      Sends an email with the user's username, email, and password.
      Parameters:
      username - The username of the user.
      email - The email of the user.
      password - The generated password for the user.

    • getUserById

      @GetMapping("/user/{id}") public User getUserById(@PathVariable("id") Long id)
      Retrieves a user by their ID.
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the user to retrieve.
      Returns:
      The user with the specified ID.
      Throws:
      UserNotFoundException - if the user with the given ID does not exist.

    • getAllUsers

      @GetMapping("/users") public List<User> getAllUsers()
      Retrieves all users.
      Returns:
      A list of all users.

    • updateUser

      @PutMapping("/user/{id}") public User updateUser(@RequestBody User update, @PathVariable("id") Long id)
      Updates a user with the provided user object.
      Parameters:
      update - The updated user object.
      id - The ID of the user to update.
      Returns:
      The updated user.
      Throws:
      UserNotFoundException - if the user with the given ID does not exist.

    • deleteUser

      @DeleteMapping("/user/{id}") public String deleteUser(@PathVariable("id") Long userId)
      Deletes a user with the specified ID.
      Parameters:
      userId - The ID of the user to delete.
      Returns:
      A string indicating the success of the operation.

    • disableUser

      @PutMapping("/{id}") public User disableUser(@PathVariable("id") Long userId)
      Disables a user with the specified ID.
      Parameters:
      userId - The ID of the user to disable.
      Returns:
      The updated user object with the checked field set to false.

    • getQuizCount

      @GetMapping("/testCount") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<TestCountResponse> getQuizCount()
      Retrieves the count of active and total tests.
      Returns:
      The response entity containing the test count.

    • getUserCount

      @GetMapping("/userCount") public Map<String,Long> getUserCount()
      Retrieves the count of total users and checked users.
      Returns:
      A map containing the user counts.

    • getSubjectCount

      @GetMapping("/subjectCount") public Map<String,Long> getSubjectCount()
      Retrieves the count of subjects.
      Returns:
      A map containing the subject count.

    • getQuestionCount

      @GetMapping("/questionCount") public Map<String,Long> getQuestionCount()
      Retrieves the count of questions.
      Returns:
      A map containing the question count.
